stories.text:
Hello again HN, It's Joe and JD from Hydra (YC W22)(https://hydras.io/).

In spirit of Postgres, we’re building a data warehouse that's accessible to every developer. The cool thing is that you can swap the storage/compute between Postgres, Snowflake, and BiqQuery(coming soon), and Postgres queries keeps working. There’s no need to change your app code to use Snowflake and BigQuery back-ends.

We think even small, budding companies should have a data warehouse. A data warehouse can start as a unified home for your product analytics, marketing campaigns, vendor payments, sales tracking, etc. before actually needing massive analytical processing.

Here’s our official release blog: https://hydras.io/blog/2022-03-21-announcing-hydra-postgres-data-warehouse
stories.title: Hydra (YC W22) releases the Postgres data warehouse
